note:
A bot for quickly looking up Magic: The Gathering cards, by @monorail

To opt in, follow me (and let me follow back). To opt out, unfollow.

While opted in, send any status with a card name in [[double square brackets]] to get a reply with details for that card. Use me without opting in by mentioning me in the status.

For much more information, just check my pinned thread.

All cards and art are copyright of Wizards of the Coast. Magic card data is obtained via the Scryfall API.
